        public RangedWeapon(int price,
                    int minimumLevel,

        Constructor of Ranged Weapon class. This is the constructor of RangedWeapon class. It calls Weapon constructor (it's super class). In future it should have specific methods and atributes.
        Parameters:
        price - Price of the item.
        minimumLevel - Minimum level required to use the item. //@param quality Quality of the item.
        name - Name of the item.
        baseDamage - Base damage of the Weapon.
